Question: Which of the following accolades did the movie 'Neerja' (2016) receive?
Options:
A. National Film Award for Best Feature Film
B. Filmfare Award for Best Film
C. Screen Award for Best Actress
D. IIFA Award for Best Story
Answer: National Film Award for Best Feature Film, Screen Award for Best Actress

Question: Which of the following accolades did the movie 'Neerja' receive after its release in 2016?
Options:
A. National Film Award for Best Feature Film
B. Filmfare Award for Best Film
C. Screen Award for Best Film
D. IIFA Award for Best Actress
Answer: National Film Award for Best Feature Film, Filmfare Award for Best Film
